postReview.title: Brentford 3-1 Southampton: Bees begin life after Toney with comfortable win
postReview.description: Brentford continued their impressive start to the season with victory over Southampton as Bryan Mbeumo starred for the Bees.

preReview.title: Frank confident Brentford will find clinical edge without Toney
preReview.description: Brentford will be without Ivan Toney for their Premier League fixture against Southampton, but Thomas Frank has put faith in his forwards.
